div.p: The current stable version of pyglet is 1.1.4. See below for the latest development release.
Choose the pyglet distribution corresponding to your platform, or select one of the source distributions below. Double-click on the downloaded file to install pyglet.

ul.li: pyglet-1.1.4.dmg: Mac OS X disk image, includes AVbin-5

div.p: The pyglet-1.1.4.msi installer only works with python versions 2.4, 2.5 or 2.6; if you wish to use python 2.7 please install from source. Simply download the source tarball or zip, unpack it, enter the directory and run: "python setup.py install". Alternatively if you are familiar with pip, "pip install pyglet" will install pyglet-1.1.4.
Download the complete documentation and application examples to go with the above platform distributions.
